objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#D2B8A3'/><defs><radialGradient id='bgGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#E6D5C8'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#B89C83'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='goldGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#F0D495'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#C6A050'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E6D5C8' stroke-width='10'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='280' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='840' cy='400' r='120' fill='url(#goldGradient)' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='3'/><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='15' fill='#C6A050'/><circle cx='900' cy='200' r='15' fill='#C6A050'/><circle cx='200' cy='800' r='15' fill='#C6A050'/><circle cx='900' cy='800' r='15' fill='#C6A050'/></g><path d='M100 300 Q 200 250, 300 300' stroke='#C6A050' fill='none' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M780 780 Q 880 830, 980 780' stroke='#C6A050' fill='none' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text: • STYLISH DESIGN • DURABLE MATERIALS • EVERYDAY SIZE

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a premium fashion accessory with a refined and elegant presentation. The background features a soft radial gradient in warm beige and cocoa tones, creating a soothing and upscale ambiance. Centered is a product image of a stylish tote bag within a white circular frame, drawing attention to the product. A bold headline text ("heading") introduces the theme, followed by a subtler subheading ("subheading") describing the product type. The price ("price") is displayed in a golden circular badge, making it eye-catching and prominent. Supporting text ("description") highlights key features, and a contrasting gold rectangular button ("cta_background" and "cta") completes the call to action at the bottom.

**Color Palette**:
- Warm Beige: #D2B8A3  
- Cocoa Brown: #614B3A  
- Gradient Gold: #F0D495 to #C6A050  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Accent Gold: #C6A050
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown leather (Hex: #B1856D), which exudes elegance and versatility. The gold metallic accents (Hex: #D4AF37) on the handles, charm chain, buttons, and ALDO logo add a luxurious and eye-catching contrast against the matte texture of the leather. The subtle grain pattern in the material provides depth, while the rich shine of the gold enhances the overall premium feel. The harmonious blend of neutral and warm tones gives it a flawless, classy aesthetic. A suitable advertisement banner can include complementary tones like ivory (#F8F5F2) and charcoal gray (#4A4A4A) for text and background balance.
